name: basic_usage_checker
query:
select concat(d.date, ' ', p.time_period) as date_time,
		concat(r.name, '-', d.data_code) as region_conn_type,
		sum(d.usage_amount) as usage_amount
		from data_intraday_agg d
		left join ref_periods p on p.id = d.period_id
		left join ref_regions r on r.id = d.region_id
		where d.data_code in(0110,1110)
		and d.date > current_date - interval 3 day
		group by concat(d.date, ' ', p.time_period),
 		concat(r.name, '-', d.data_code)

name: basic jepx 30min
query:
select concat(j.date, ' ', p.time_period) as date_time,
	#j.region_id,
    r.jp_name,
	j.spot_price
	from jepx_da_pivot j
	left join ref_periods p on p.id = j.period_id
    left join ref_regions r on r.id = j.region_id
	where j.date > CURRENT_DATE - interval 1 day
	group by j.date, j.period_id, j.region_id
	order by j.date desc

name: basic jepx daily
query:
select #concat(j.date, ' ', p.time_period) as date_time,
    j.date,
	r.jp_name,
	avg(j.spot_price)
	from jepx_da_pivot j
	left join ref_periods p on p.id = j.period_id
    left join ref_regions r on r.id = j.region_id
	where j.date > CURRENT_DATE - interval 30 day
	group by j.date, j.region_id
	order by j.date desc
